attributes.action: allow MPs the right to have a free vote in line with the usual convention for/against embryovote
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many MPs are unhappy about not having a free vote and feel that the  
usual convention should be observed. We ask that MPs are given a free vote with regards 
to the Human Fertilisation and Embryology  Bill.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
